A circumglobal species ( Ramil & Vervoort 1992 ), widely distributed in deep waters of the Atlantic Ocean ( Vervoort 2006 ). Its bathymetric distribution extends between 300 and 1727 m ( Stepanjants 2012 ; Gil 2017).
